title: Mukuru
brand: Mukuru is a FinTech and remittance company in South Africa.
contentChallenge: Back to school is one of the peak times for remittance making it a highly competitive time in the market. How do we stand out from the crowd?
contentSolution: Sports heroes represent the ultimate success and it is usually a dream that children have. We used the Mukuru brand ambassador, Beast, an ex-Springbok rugby player, we brought him back to school to inspire the kids in our campaign. I worked on the big idea for this campaign with my team. I wrote the script for the TV ad, radio ad, and all other copy for this campaign.
